content: Park in Singapore **Mount Emily Park** covers 3.1 [hectares](/wiki/Hectare) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The park is located in District 9, next to Istana and close to the areas known as [Little India](/wiki/Little_India,_Singapore) and [Bugis](/wiki/Bugis_Street). It contains a stand of mature trees, which serve to moderate the climate in nearby areas. - [Mount Emily Reservoir](/wiki/Mount_Emily_Reservoir) - [Mount Emily Swimming Pool](/wiki/Mount_Emily_Swimming_Pool) - Mount Emily Park at National Parks Board This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Mount Emily Park
